rules_text:
Double strike
[i]Racket of Solm[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose target opponent. Until your next turn, whenever that player casts a spell, goad target creature. [i](Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]
[i]Queen of Solm[/i] – Whenever a creature an opponent controls deals combat damage to another player, its controller draws a card, and you put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
